title: Regency Enterprises | Corus Entertainment Fandom | Fandom
snippet: Regency Enterprises (commonly referred to as Regency onscreen and credited as Monarchy Enterprises S.á.r.l.) is an American entertainment company formed by Arnon Milchan. It was founded in 1991 as the successor to Regency International Pictures ...

title: Regency Enterprises (Creator) - TV Tropes
snippet: Arnon Milchan rebranded Regency International Pictures and renamed it to Regency Enterprises. In addition to signing a distribution deal with Warner Bros., a subsidiary company New Regency Productions was also created.

title: Regency Enterprises | Princess Pictures Wiki | Fandom
snippet: This company produced films such as Once Upon a Time in America, and Q&A. Aaron shut the company down in 1991. Arnon Milchan rebranded Regency International Pictures and renamed it Regency Enterprises.
